key_themes: AI infrastructure supply constraints vs valuation extremes
Crypto regulatory tailwinds and institutional adoption narrative
Rate policy uncertainty and inflation trajectory
risk_factors: Technical breakdown risk - NDX multi-month triangle violation imminent per Twitter analysis
Valuation extremes - elevated Shiller P/E and AI bubble mentions suggesting sentiment exhaustion
Mega-cap participation failure - NVDA/AAPL not confirming new highs despite rally
BTC liquidation fragility above $92K zone indicating crypto vulnerability
Q1 earnings critical test for consumer discretionary and financials per RSS warnings
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: Active resistance $693 (48k OI), active support $680 (85k OI). QQQ: Active resistance $627-$630 zone (53k+33k OI), call wall pressure at $641 (55k OI). Max pain gravitational pull: SPY $687, QQQ $618

QQQ: Call wall resistance $641 (55k OI) caps upside, dormant support at $590-$580 zone if technical breakdown materializes. Multi-week consolidation zone anticipated
